name: Isolation Story
description:
From the creator of After The End: The Harvest & Mutiny Island...
Isolation Story is a LIFE-SIM style game where you buy supplies, avoid people, and manage your SICKNESS using your new GOV PHONE.

Drink water, wash your hands, and use Medical Supplies to keep the SICKNESS at bay.
Can you endure 7 days of Isolation inside of LOCKDOWN CITY? The game where speaking to NPC's can make you sick!
Among other things...

Manage your FOOD, STAMINA, and HAPPINESS to survive.

GAME INCLUDES:
NORMAL MODE: Survive 7 days of lockdown by working from home, shopping for supplies & more
ISOLATION MODE: Complete the game without being able to leave your apartment
ENDLESS MODE: Play endlessly!

The game is compatible with most PC controllers.
A Controller recommended for the smoothest experience.
